name: Bionc
description:
A gunman left alone in a dark and dirty city, you have broken into the cybernetically enhanced mafia's hideout to destroy them from the inside, in order to vindicate yourself from what you did... too bad all you have is a handgun and some junk you got from the dumpster out back...

A simplistic arcade shooter with which has waves of the cybermafia coming after you, where your only defense is the handgun you wield. Move, find powerups, and strategically reload to survive until the end and take out the kingpin.

This game was made more as a basic and quick idea than a fully planned experience, so please forgive any bugs or unbalanced problems with it, and let me know so I can try to fix them!
